test.doc: Check performance of memory and BMC CPU.

suite.doc:
Trigger code update to a target BMC. Execution Method : python -m robot -v OPENBMC_HOST:<hostname> -v FILE_PATH:<path/*all.tar> update_bmc.robot
Code update method BMC using REST Update work flow sequence: - User input BMC File existence check - Ping Test and REST authentication - Set Host Power host setting Policy to RESTORE_LAST_STATE On reboot this policy would ensure the BMC comes online and stays at HOST_POWERED_OFF state. - Issue poweroff - Prune archived journal logs - Prepare for Update - Wait for BMC to come online clean - Wait for BMC_READY state - Apply preserve BMC Network setting - SCP image to BMC - Activate the flash image - Warm Reset BMC to activate code - Wait for BMC to come online time out 30 minutes - Version check post update
